README:
nearnet

- A Matlab implementation of local coordinate coding.
- A C++ implementation of locality constrained linear coding.
- Not sure what the state of either is.

Refs:

http://arxiv.org/abs/0906.5190
http://www.ifp.illinois.edu/~jyang29/LLC.htm

Things you might need:

IMAGES.mat

http://redwood.berkeley.edu/bruno/sparsenet/IMAGES.mat

lbfgsb

https://github.com/jackculpepper/lbfgsb-stewart
